com.republicate.modality.webapp.auth.BaseFormAuthFilter

    com.republicate.modality.webapp.auth  

    • Uses of BaseFormAuthFilter in com.republicate.modality.webapp.auth

      Subclasses of BaseFormAuthFilter in com.republicate.modality.webapp.auth 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FormAuthFilter
      Authentication filter relying on a query returning a user instance whenever his/her credentials are correct, using the <login/> and <password/> placeholder parameters.
      class  RememberMeFormAuthFilter
      Form authentication filter that handles a "remember me" cookie.
